name: FoxPro Dynamic-Link Library
summary: An FLL file contains a dynamically linked library created by Visual FoxPro, a database management program for Windows. It stores a compiled set of procedures, or functions, that can only be called from Visual FoxPro. FLL files are similar to .DLL files, which are commonly used in Windows, but FLL files can only be used with Visual FoxPro.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
